name: Stop That Wolf
description:
This game is posted for BYOG 2021 Game Jam 

It is based around all three themes available for the jam

RESET : position of wolf and house is randomly allotted every try .. In other words you will have different position for wolf and house every time  TWO VIEWS : you shift between fixed view and kind of 3d person view by holding Right Mouse Button  Minimal Interaction : after you choose place for your meat in desired stop, character's move by them self after that
